title: The Hitler question
author: VD
content_html:
Discuss here, if you are so inclined. Got a very interesting email on Einstein as well, there’s some pretty solid evidence to indicate that I may have been too generous to simply concede the point of the first chapter of TGD to Richard Dawkins.

If you’re visiting for the first time since this weekend, the TIA discussion forums are now active and you can download the complete ebook, with footnotes of varying degrees of legibility depending on the format – PDF and DOC are easiest – as well.
content_text:
Discuss here, if you are so inclined.  Got a very interesting email on Einstein as well, there’s some pretty solid evidence to indicate that I may have been too generous to simply concede the point of the first chapter of TGD to Richard Dawkins.

download the complete ebook
, with footnotes of varying degrees of legibility depending on the format – PDF and DOC are easiest – as well.
